NewsItem.HEADLINE: RF Front Ends (Licensed) for Mobile Devices Annual Market Study 2019 (PDF) with Forecast (Excel File)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A definitive review of all RF components used in smartphones, PC, hotspot, and IoT apps.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The five-year forecast covers PA, filter, switch, front end modules, and mm-wave modules with shipment, revenue, pricing, and market share estimates. Block diagrams for key smartphones are included.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: PA Filter Duplexer Quadplexer Switch FEM PAMiD FEMiD
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: MEXP-RFFE-19 rev0 ericsson.pdf, MEXP-RFFE-19 rev0 ericsson.xlsx,
